sentences.en: All you ever want to do is go shopping!
sentences.cn: 你想做的事就只是去购物！

sentences.en: As far as shopping for clothes goes, it's a drag.
sentences.cn: 逛街买衣服是件挺没意思的事。

sentences.en: Caroline joined them on the shopping expeditions.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳加入了他们的购物之旅。

sentences.en: Half the shops are boarded up on the estate's small shopping street.
sentences.cn: 在该住宅区的小型购物街上有一半商店都已封上了门窗。

sentences.en: How about going shopping and seeing a show in London?
sentences.cn: 去伦敦购物再看场演出怎么样？

sentences.en: I didn't realize how heavy that shopping was going to be.
sentences.cn: 我没想到买的东西会有多沉。

sentences.en: I remarked that I would go shopping that afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我说过我那天下午要去购物。

sentences.en: I went on a shopping spree (= went shopping and bought a lot of things ) at the weekend and spent far too much money.
sentences.cn: 我周末大买特买了一番，花了好多钱。

sentences.en: I’ve got to do some last-minute shopping.
sentences.cn: 我得去作最后一刻的大采购。

sentences.en: Late-night shopping is becoming very popular.
sentences.cn: 深夜购物越来越普遍了。

sentences.en: Now what about that shopping list? I've got to get going.
sentences.cn: 那张购物清单呢？我得出发了。

sentences.en: Prices may vary so it's well worth shopping around before you buy.
sentences.cn: 价格可能会有高有低，所以在买之前很有必要货比三家。

sentences.en: Sainsbury's is offering customers 1p for each shopping bag re-used.
sentences.cn: 塞恩斯伯里超市为重复利用购物袋的顾客提供每只1便士的奖励。

sentences.en: Saturday night was a late-night shopping night.
sentences.cn: 周六晚上购物可以持续到深夜。

sentences.en: She could go shopping, and wax her legs.
sentences.cn: 她可以去逛商店，顺便除一下腿毛。

sentences.en: Shirley returned home empty-handed from her shopping trip.
sentences.cn: 雪莉出去购物，回家时却两手空空。

sentences.en: Shopping in the January sales can be maddening.
sentences.cn: 在元月促销期间购物可能会让人大为恼火。

sentences.en: The new shopping centre was constructed at a cost of 1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 新建成的购物中心耗资110万。

phrases.tran_cn: 家庭购物（指邮购、电视、电话或电脑购物）
一站式购物；一站式采购
购物商场；商店街，商场部

trans.tran_cn: 购物，买东西，工作室，制作室，车间，家庭作坊
trans.tran_en: the activity of going to shops and buying things
